body_content.explanation: If a video game is playable, it is easy and enjoyable to play:
examples: I've been looking for a decent, playable space empire game for ages.
These games are mostly playable but are said to still have some speed and compatibility issues.

body_content.explanation: If a piece of music or an instrument is playable, it is not too difficult for someone to play:
examples: The New York is a very playable guitar.
"Her piano music is very playable," he said.

body_content.explanation: If a surface on which sports are played is playable, it is easy or possible to play on:
examples: The tennis courts were a little worn but very playable.
He said the pitch was perfectly playable, but the stadium management wanted to avoid further deterioration.

body_content.explanation: If a ball is playable, it can be caught, passed, hit, etc. within the rules of the game, or because it has not gone outside the field of play:
examples: The ball is playable if it is touching any part of a line.
In cricket, bowlers deliver six playable balls to batsmen in succession to account for one "over".
As long as the ball doesn't hit the floor, it's playable.

body_content.explanation: If a film is playable, audiences have a good reaction to it when they see it:
examples: The American version of the popular film sadly failed to be playable due to poor casting.
